page.title: 09MY FAMILY
page.content: THE O'MALLEY FAMILY LIVE IN{SANDHUTTON ,A VILLAGE NEAR THIRSK THE FAMILY- KEVIN AND LYNDA HAVE THREE CHILDREN; HANNAH 10, CHARLOTTE 8 AND JOSHUA 6.KEVIN EARNS HIS LIVING FROM SELLING LADIES CLOTHING IN FOUR SHOPS IN LOCAL MARKET TOWNS. WE LIVE IN THE OLD VICARAGE, WHICH IS SITUATED ON THE EDGE OF THE VILLAGE AND HAS 14 ACRES OF GRASS LAND. WE HAVE 14 PONIES AND 26 EWES AND LAMBS,A LARGE KITCHEN GARDEN GROWING MOST VEGETABLES AND FRUIT AND ONE AND A HALF ACRES OF LAWNS AND FLOWERBEDS. OUR HOBBY AS A FAMILY IS SHOWING PONIES,ALL THREE CHILDREN RIDE.WE TRAVEL TO SHOWS ALL OVER THE COUNTRY IN A HORSEBOX. WE BUY OUR FOOD IN SUPERMARKETS, AND FROM MARKET STALLS IN NORTHALLERTON AND THIRSK.WE BUY OUR CLOTHES IN HARROGATE OR LEEDS.
